content:
Others

User Profile

  1. Soon as you access the MENU panel, right at the top is your NAME – CLIENT ID. Tap to go inside. The personal details page opens up
  2. ACTIONS – CHANGE PASSWORD & CHANGE PIN
  3. Top right of the page is the Gear icon (image) Tap to Reset your Password or Pin from here

Support & Feedback

For you to directly get in-touch with relevant teams for any issue, this is the section. Use MENU - > SUPPORT & FEEDBACK. This is sub-divided into CALL FOR TRADE – SUPPORT – SHARE APP – FEEDBACK – ABOUT US - APP WALKTHROUGH

  1. CALL FOR TRADE – This will directly get you in-touch with our trading desk
  2. SUPPORT – This doubles –up as Contact us and Grievance/Inquiry section. The Top half shows the Head-office address, Customer Care number (Just tap the icon to place a call) and Customer-care id – support@jiffy.in
Note: The bottom half is the message section which directly comes to the customer-care team. Your name and registered email id is already entered, simply select SUBJECT from the dropdown pertaining to your issue - insert the message and Tap 'Send Message'

Share App

Share Choice FinX with any of your friends, relatives or anyone within your circle of influence. Using this feature shares a download link and you get the benefit of a REFERRAL!!

Feedback

Like Choice FinX? Or have a suggestion? Rate and send a message along with it. It will be posted on the relevant APP Store allowing our team to get on it immediately.

App Walkthrough

New to the App? Or would like to see what features the app has to offer? This feature takes you on a broad tour of the APP starting from Top Right. Tap the RED area to goto the next feature.
